channel.title: Abouts on Enrique Acosta Jaramillo
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Enrique Acosta Jaramillo

item.title: About This Blog
item.description: I like to always be learning new things (like for example how to make my own personal blog site!), and I am trying out writing about these personal excursions. I think I will enjoy it. Making it public in case anyone finds any of it useful/interesting! Contact me if you have any questions or comments about what you find. You can find more about me in the Grupo LEMA site (in Spanish) or an old personal site (in English) which I no longer update.
